page.title: 19SERVICES
page.content: IN OUR AREA WE HAVE A SCHOOL, A FIRE STATION WITH ONE FIRE TENDER AND A VOLUNTARY FIRE FIGHTING CREW. WE ALSO HAVE A SUB-POLICE STATION WITH ONE POLICE MAN. HE USUALLY USES A CAR BUT SOMETIMES HE USES A MOTORBIKE. THE MOUNTAIN GOAT RUNS PEOPLE FROM WINDERMERE TO GLENRIDDING AND BACK AGAIN.WE HAVE A STEAMER SERVICE IN THE SUMMER. THE LONGEST RIDE IS TO POOLEY BRIDGE AND BACK. THERE ARE QUITE A LOT OF DIFFERENT SHOPS IN THE VILLAGE. THESE ALL PROVIDE A VALUABLE SERVICE TO BOTH THE LOCALS AND TOURISTS ALIKE. THE COMMUNITY ALSO HAS A MOUNTAIN RESCUE BASE WHICH COVERS THE HELVELLYN RANGE OF MOUNTAINS. THE NATIONAL PARK ALSO HAS AN INFORMATION OFFICE, WHICH IS MOBILE AND IS SITUATED IN GLENRIDDING CAR PARK DURING THE SUMMER MONTHS. THERE IS ALSO A SMALL HEALTH CENTRE.
